INSIGHT: Crypto super PACs outspent Wall Street, Big Oil & Big Pharma in the 2024 election.

Our 'Bitcoin for President' documentary goes behind the scenes of how crypto became one of the most powerful forces in US politics.
LATEST: Arizona’s $BTC Reserve bills face their final vote today, positioning the state to become the first to pass a State Bitcoin Reserve.

At LONGITUDE: Dubai, expect
UPDATE: Digital asset investment products saw $3.4B in inflows last week, the third-highest on record, with $BTC leading at $3.18B and $ETH ending an eight-week outflow streak.

INSIGHT: Pump-and-dump is one of the most common crypto manipulation tactics. 

A coordinated group quietly buys a low-cap token, ignites hype through influencers, then sells at the peak—leaving retail investors holding worthless tokens.
Find out how crypto price manipulation influence the market and how to protect yourself from one.
BULLISH: BlackRock’s Jay Jacob says, “Bitcoin thrives when you have more uncertainty and are looking for something that’s going to behave differently.”
FOMC: Polymarket users predict a 90% chance that the Fed will not make any rate cut changes on May 7.
JUST IN: Bitcoin was finally being recognized for what it is, a non-sovereign store of value during times of “US-risk-off” sentiment,says NYDIG’s Greg Cipolaro.
